original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 326.70/90 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 326.70/90 to the US dollar on Friday, from 326.65/90 the previous day, dealers said.
The Colombo Stock Exchange opened up; the ASPI was up 0.05 percent at 10,789, and the S&P SL20 was up 0.08 percent at 3,121.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 13.83/87 percent from 13.75/90 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 13.80/85 percent from 13.80/90 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.05/15 percent from 14.00/15 percent. (Colombo/Dec15/2023)
